name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with expertise in developing scalable and reliable applications. Proficient in **Ruby**, **Go**, **Typescript**, and **Elixir** for backend solutions, with a strong focus on **API** development, **Observability**, and **Scalability**. Skilled in enhancing process improvement and delivering high-quality code through strong problem-solving abilities and ownership mentality. Combined with experience in **Java** and **Spring Boot**, as well as frontend frameworks like **React**, **Vue**, and **Angular**, I consistently drive impactful solutions in sectors such as healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, achieving significant performance enhancements.

experience.responsibilities:
• Leveraged **Ruby**, **Go**, and **Typescript** to develop scalable backend services, ensuring robust API management and observability.
• Enhanced process improvement methodologies that led to a **40%** increase in operational efficiency.
• Implemented observability practices that improved system reliability and troubleshooting capacity, reducing problem resolution time by **25%**.
• Championed ownership of backend processes, leading cross-functional collaborations that resulted in the successful deployment of features with a **30%** reduction in turnaround time.
• Streamlined API integration methodologies, achieving **99%** uptime and facilitating seamless communication across services.
• Conducted regular code reviews and collaborative problem-solving sessions, fostering a culture of continuous improvement across the team.

Implemented APIs to ensure robust integration with services, enhancing observability and scalability of backend systems.
Applied **Ruby** and **Go** for optimizing backend performance, driving process improvements that increased system efficiency by 30%.
Designed and maintained scalable infrastructure solutions, utilizing **Elixir** to handle performance bottlenecks and improve response times by 20%.
Led problem-solving initiatives resulting in a **25%** reduction in system downtime through proactive monitoring and observability practices.
Took ownership of projects to streamline development processes, employing **Typescript** for clearer and more maintainable code, resulting in a 15% decrease in bugs.

Developed backend services using **Java** (**Spring Boot**) and **Node.js**, reducing response times for ticketing and customer support by **25%**.
Designed a notification system with **Kafka** for real-time alerts, achieving a **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues.
Created a customer insights dashboard using **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, improving resolution rates by **20%**.
Automated testing and deployment with **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a consistent release process.
Deployed the platform on **AWS EC2** with **Docker** and **Terraform**, cutting infrastructure setup time by **50%**.

• Developed and maintained scalable backend APIs using **Ruby**, achieving a response time under **100ms**.
• Implemented observability best practices, reducing issue resolution time by **25%**.
• Ensured code quality and performance through process improvement strategies, increasing system reliability by **15%**.
• Applied problem-solving skills to troubleshoot and optimize existing systems, enhancing overall functionalities.
• Took ownership of project timelines and deliverables, consistently meeting deadlines with thorough documentation.
